meta: š, č, h, y, w, ą are specific sounds of the Lakhota language.
train: matho ki hipi ną lakhota ki čhopi
The bears came and called the Indian.
You came, and the boy killed you.
lakhota ki wačho ną hokšila ki wakte
I called the Indian and killed the boy.
hokšila ki wakte čha tuwa lakhota ki wičhačho
I killed the boy, and someone called the Indians.
The Indians came, and you called me.
test: wahi čha lakhota ki hokšila ki wičhačhopi ną matho
The Indians killed the boy, and the bear came.
wahi čha ną wičhaša ki wakte
You came and killed the Indian.
wičhaša ki hipi čha ną hokšila ki nikte
The people came, and someone killed them
wahi čha lakhota ki matho ki wičhačhopi
The bear came and killed the Indian.
The person killed the bear and called me.
Someone killed the person and the bear.
